trans-unit.source: Specifies the alignment of a rendered object.
trans-unit.target: 指定的對齊方式轉譯的物件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The Alignment enumeration represents the horizontal positioning of an item on its parent container, such as a panel or form.
trans-unit.target: 對齊列舉，代表其父容器，例如工作面板或表單上的項目水平位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you add an image to a form, you can set its horizontal position to align with the right side of the form.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您將影像加入至表單，您可以設定以配合表單右下方的水平位置。

trans-unit.source: Although you can use the bit values in scripting languages, you cannot use them with ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以在指令碼語言中使用的位元值，您無法搭配 ASP.NET 使用它們。

trans-unit.source: For example, `Alignment = "2"` within a panel tag is not a valid statement.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Alignment = "2"`面板內標記不是有效的陳述式。

trans-unit.source: However, in Visual C#, you can use `this.myPanel.Alignment = 2`.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在 Visual C# 中，您可以使用`this.myPanel.Alignment = 2`。

trans-unit.source: Aligns with the center of the screen.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Aligns with the left of the screen.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Default value.
If the value is NotSet, then the alignment is inherited from the control's style, or, if the style is not defined, from the control's parent control.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為 NotSet、，然後對齊方式都繼承自控制項的樣式，或者，如果未定義的樣式，從控制項的父控制項。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。
